about_the_game:
Star Boy and The Captain of Outer Space
is an action packed On-Rails shooter / Third Person Adventure
by solo developer Kelcie Caldwell aka Not Unlike Games.

Travel the bounds of the galaxy providing hope for many who have since lost theirs.
You'll blast your way through asteroid fields, narrowly slip your ship through the junk canyon,
and save the people of outer space from a slew of denizens!

Star Boy and the Captain of Outer Space features heavy on rails shooter elements modelled after that one on rails shooter we all miss and love.
Star Boy and the Captain of Outer Space also uses a light Third Person Shooter element to take you out of the ship, and immerse you in the worlds you are out there saving!

Explore the Outer Space!


With a non linear story and multiple playable characters. You can explore a multitude of planets playing as Star Boy and/or The Captain of Outer Space.

Save the People!


There's a lot of baddies in Outer Space and just not enough goodies to go around.
Help clean up the inter-stellar riff raff by being an extra good goodie.

Work for an adorable Kitty!


The Leader of your team is none other than General Tippy herself.
General Tippy has a galactic reputation of being super cute and fluffy.
But watch out! She'll bring the thunder to the rumble.

Fight the bad!


Outer Space, in all of its vast wonder and infinite resources.
Has been turned to a dismal waste by the evil ConnieCon Conglomerate.
Can you curb the impending destruction of outer space?

Stop for Donuts!


Don't forget that you can't save Outer Space on an empty stomach.
I like the plain old fashioned cake donuts myself.

name: Star Boy and The Captain of Outer Space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 2 GB | AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 | AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780, 3 GB | AMD Radeon R9 290X, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Star Boy and the Captain of Outer Space is a On Rails Sci-Fi Space Shooter Adventure from Not Unlike Games! Featuring light Third Person Shooter element, Multiple Playable Characters, and a Dynamic Story!
